task.title: How To Use Blacksburg Transit
task.shortdesc: Blacksburg Transit is an extremely useful tool at your disposal, and I think it would be wise for you to use it to get to class each day.

context.note: There are two ways to use the bus, the first (and easiest) is showing the driver your Hokie Passport. The second is to pay...but you're a college student so we know that ain't gonna happen.

step.cmd: Collect your wallet, phone, keys, backpack and most importantly, HOKIE PASSPORT!
Step outside out apartment and look straight ahead. There is a small building with a fence around it directly outside our apartment.
When you see the building, walk directly to its left and follow that street until you see a small school to your right.
There is a cabana directly on the sidewalk, stand in that cabana until the bus comes.
